name: Horror Tales
description:
3 classic horror tales illustrated in pixel art and supplemented with chilling audio by Kevin MacLeod! Sit down fiend, and see if you can stomach these three macabre tales! All introduced by our favorite fiendish ghoul with an obsession with classic literature.

-Gruesome tales include -

Dagon - By H.P. Lovecraft

A man becomes stranded on a strange land and makes a disturbing discovery of an ancient evil.

One Summer Night - By Ambrose Bierce

Henry wakes up to find himself buried alive! But above him, grave-robbers are digging their way down.

The Tell-Tale Heart - By Edgar Allan Poe

An Evil Eye torments our deranged protagonist. Only murder will rid himself of the eye forever.
